bibl.title: More Greek Horoscopes from Kellis (Dakhleh Oasis).
bibl.note: Suite de: IIDEM, A Greek Horoscope From 373 A.D., ZPE 106 (1995) pp. 235-240, 1 tabl. et pl. XI [cf. maintenant P. Kellis Gr. I, 84]. - Present five new fourth-century A.D. Greek horoscopes found during recent Australian excavations conducted by Dr C.A. Hope at Ismant el-Kharab (ancient Kellis) in the Egyptian Dakhleh Oasis. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Horoscopes 2a and 2b. T. Kellis Gr. Inv. D/8/114. - 3. Horoscope 3. P. Kellis Gr. Inv. P98.1. - 4. Horoscopes 4a and 4b. P. Kellis Gr. Inv. P00.22.
